## `gdocker build`

Build Docker images with automatic dependency resolution.
To see help and available options for this command:

```{bash}
gdocker help build
```

Example: See the build instructions of the `star_a:latest` image (and its dependencies if needed) in the `docker_images/arm` directory:

```{bash}
gdocker build -n star_a
```
